程序包 frogger.model

类 Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.model.Score
  • public class Score
extends java.lang.Object

    Score

    The Score class is used to keep the record of player's score and provide some operations to make change of the score

    Use: 

                    Score score = new Score() or Score score = new Score(points);
                score.addScore(point);
                score.subScore(point);
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    GameController

      • points

        private int points
        The value of the score.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Score

        public Score()

        The constructor of Score class to generate instance.

        This constructor set the original points to zero.

      • Score

        public Score​(int points)

        The constructor of Score class to generate instance.

        This constructor set the original points to given input points.

        参数:
        points - The initial point

    • 方法详细资料

      • addScore

        public void addScore​(int point)

        Increases the points by the given points.

        参数:
        point - an integer to be added to the points

      • subScore

        public void subScore​(int point)

        Decreases the points by the given points.

        参数:
        point - an integer to be subtracted to the points

      • getScore

        public int getScore()

        Returns the points

        返回:
        an integer indicating the value of score

      • setScore

        public void setScore​(int points)

        Set the points by the given points.

        参数:
        points - an integer to be set to the points
